name: Holiday Inn Express Hotel & Suites Lafayette East

reviews.text: This was a great hotel for a quick overnight stop on the way to Chicago. For a Holiday Inn Express it is bare minimum from the decorations to the breakfast.
reviews.title: Good but not what I would expect

reviews.text: Breakfast was a large disappointment. We stay at
reviews.title: Great Stay

reviews.text: This brand with kids just for the breakfast. They had no fruit besides heavily bruised bananas. There was no meat selection. Only biscuits, gravy, and eggs. Cold food selection was good.
reviews.title: Excellent stay. Quiet. Great beds and pillows!
The smell of "new" here
reviews.text: Overall it was clean and if all you need us a place to sleep I would recommend it. Right off the highway and a newer hotel.

Stopped here on my way home. This hotel is brand new and you can smell it. All items in the room were working and the bed was super comfortable. The property is well maintained and the staff at the front desk were very nice. I'm a Priority Club Platinum member and can say this is the best HI Express I have stayed in. Breakfast was great with plenty of items to choose. Loved the fresh fruit selection. If I have to return to this area, this is were I will stay, thanks.
reviews.title: Brand new and very nice

reviews.text: Very reasonable price for suite style-room. Hotel looks new and is still nice and clean. On the trip back decided to stay again and the front desk did not have the roll away bed we requested so we were updgraded to a bigger room. Easy in and off the highway. Would definitely stay again if I was in the area.
reviews.title: Newer hotel - great service and rooms

reviews.text: Just back from a 14 day roadtrip.
reviews.title: Can't fault this hotel.

reviews.text: This hotel was the best(and the cheapest) we stayed in.
reviews.title: Awesome

reviews.text: Friendly check in, great room, great wifi, great breakfast.
reviews.title: New Holiday Inn Express

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Property was located about a 10 min drive from Tippecanoe Mall.
reviews.title: What a surprise!

reviews.text: Booked this hotel for Homecoming weekend at Purdue as it was the only place available. Hotel was extremely overpriced, but it was our only option. Booked a king suite as we had three adults in our party. Pull out bed in couch was in "living area" between the entrance/kitchen and the bedroom. There was no light in the entire area which made it quite dark and the frig. was placed against the wall opposite the couch. It seems the frig. was to big to fit in the designed opening in the kitchen so the large hole sat vacant while the frig. was awkwardly placed against the wall in the living area. Hairdryer in the bathroom came unscrewed from it's wall mounting and fell on the counter. Asked front desk for additional blanket as the one on the bed was very thin and got one with a blood stain on it. For a new hotel it apprears that it was put up in a hurry and attention to detail was overlooked.
reviews.title: overpriced and overrated

reviews.text: The rooms were spotless , and the beds were comfortable ! The people so friendly! They went out if their way to be helpful. There were cookies! It was also located near restaurants and groceries . Parking was easy and free.
reviews.title: Great place

reviews.text: seemed very new, it was nice, clean, decent beds (they even mark the pillows "soft' & "hard" ) breakfast was great. overall a good stay and would recomend to anyone. If i had anything bad to say, the TV was kinda small?
reviews.title: very nice & new

reviews.text: Okay, this would be the first time I've written a review before my stay is over at a hotel but my disappointment with this hotel is that great.
reviews.title: Huge disappointment......

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.title: Nice hotel on our way to Chicago
